Černičevi zobljejo češnje, Črničevi pa črešnje
V Sevnici so se na 6. srečanju zbrali Černičevi in Črničevi. Imajo celo svojo zastavo in grb.
05 Nov 2019, 13:26 by Nada Černič Cvetanovski



Prvič so se dobili leta 2007. FOTOgrafije: NADA ČERNIČ CVETANOVSKI



Zadnje srečanje Č(e)rničevih na sevniškem gradu



Spominska steklenica



V kraju srečanja, kjer se je rodila prva dama Amerike, je bilo treba poskusiti tudi palačinke Melanija.


SEVNICA – Po podatkih Statističnega urada Republike Slovenije je 1. januarja 2010 priimek Černič v Sloveniji uporabljalo 194 oseb in je med vsemi priimki po pogostosti uvrščen na 2222. mesto. Ob izgovorjavi nekateri poudarijo črko e, drugi pa i. Ob tem obstaja še priimek Črnič. Nosilci teh priimkov, ki med seboj niso nujno v sorodu, se srečujejo že od leta 2007.
Podžupanova zamisel
Ideja za srečanje se je porodila nekdanjemu metliškemu podžupanu Antonu Černiču. »V časopisih sem večkrat bral o srečanjih sošolcev ali sorodnikov; gre za lepa doživetja, ki ljudi zbližujejo,« pripoveduje Anton. Čeprav ima številne izkušnje z organizacijo prireditev, saj redno pripravlja srečanje rojenih v Metliki, se je zavedal, da bo to velik in zahteven zalogaj, predvsem zaradi obveščanja. Naključje mu je na pot pripeljalo Jureta Černiča iz Ljubljane. Ta je prišel na občino Metliko, da bi naredil reklamne panoje; z Antonom se nista srečala, a ker je Jure pustil telefonsko številko, ga je podžupan poklical, ker ga je želel spoznati. Še istega dne sta se srečala in ugotovila, da imata skupne prednike. Jure je bil takoj pripravljen sodelovati pri organizaciji srečanja Černičevih. Brskala sta po telefonskem imeniku in internetu in iskala priimek Černič.


Zadnje srečanje Č(e)rničevih na sevniškem gradu

Pri tem pa sta spoznala, da je veliko priimkov Črnič. Ugotovila sta, da je to pravzaprav isti priimek, le da je eden z e, drugi pa brez njega. »Celo moj stric je bil Črnič, drugi pa smo bili Černič, zato sva se dogovorila, da bova obveščala ljudi obeh priimkov,« se spominja Anton. Na vabilo sta zapisala Prvo srečanje Černič-Črnič, nato pa ugotovila, da je tudi na Primorskem veliko priimkov Černic, torej brez strešice. A vabila so bila že natisnjena in jih nista popravljala. Poslanih je bilo 150, mnoge sta poklicala kar po telefonu.Prvo srečanje leta 2007, ki se ga je udeležilo skoraj sto sopriimenjakov, večinoma iz Bele krajine, Kranja in Sevnice, je bilo na Krasincu pri Metliki. Popestrila sta ga humorist Toni Gašperič in Alenka Mežnaršič, ki je najbolj zaslužna za zaščito belokranjske pogače, zbrane pa je pozdravila tudi takratna županja Renata Brunskole. Navdušeni so sklenili, da se še dobijo. Naslednje leto se jih je v Beli krajini zbralo 86, nato pa so srečanja organizirali vsaki dve leti.
Iz Somborja se je javil Černić
Na četrtem srečanju Černičevih in Črničevih v Krasincu pri Metliki, največ teh priimkov se pojavlja prav v Beli krajini, so sprejeli pobudo organizacijskega odbora, da bi imeli Č(e)rničevi svoj prepoznavni simbol – zastavo in grb. Tistega leta je namreč minevalo 420 let, odkar se je ta priimek pojavil v Sloveniji. Č(e)rničeva zastava je iz dveh barv, modre in oranžne, na sredini je ščit in v njem črka č. Da je znak bolj poln, je v njem še češnja, saj se začenja s črko č, raste povsod po Sloveniji tako kot Č(e)rničevi, za nameček pa jo nekateri imenujejo češnja, drugi pa črešnja, kar spada ravno k Černičevim, saj imajo nekateri v priimku e, drugi pa ga nimajo. Grb in zastavo je zasnoval Anton Černič.Zadnje, šesto srečanje Černičevih in Črničevih je bilo prvič organizirano v Melanijinem mestu, v Sevnici. Zbrani so si najprej ogledali film o sevniškem gradu in nato pod strokovnim vodstvom še grad, potem pa so se odpravili na 947 metrov visoko Lisco, ki slovi kot biser Posavja.


Spominska steklenica

Predvidoma bo tudi prihodnje srečanje v Sevnici, a bo morda mednarodno obarvano. Po zapisih o srečanjih Č(e)rničevih se je oglasil Luka Černić iz Somborja, ki že nekaj let raziskuje svoje korenine. »Moji Černićevi so leta 1715 zaradi lakote zapustil vasi ob Kolpi, Pravutino ali Krasinec in se kot kmetje naselili v madžarski del Baranje. Pozneje so prišli na somborsko območje. Černićevi iz Somborja smo pred kratkim praznovali 270. obletnico priselitve v te kraje, kajti po znanih podatkih sta poleti 1749 iz Baranje prišla Matija in Magdalena Černić,« poroča Luka Černić, ki se je testiral v laboratoriju v Beogradu in v FTDNA v Houstonu. Tako je ugotovil, da ima sorodnike v Beli krajini. Daljni sopriimenjak si želi, da bi tudi kdo od slovenskih Černičevih opravil test DNK, da bi spoznal, s kom ima skupne prednike izpred 350 oziroma 400 let. 


V kraju srečanja, kjer se je rodila prva dama Amerike, je bilo treba poskusiti tudi palačinke Melanija.
text:
Chernik's toothed cherries, and Chernic's's cherries
At the 6th meeting, the Černičević and Črničević gathered in Sevnica. They even have their flag and coat of arms.
05 Nov 2019, 13:26 by Nada Cernic Cvetanovski



They first came out in 2007. PHOTOS: NADA ČERNIČ CVETANOVSKI



Last meeting of Č (e) rnic's at the castle in Sevnica



A memorial bottle



Melanie pancakes also had to be tried at the venue where the first lady of America was born.


SEVNICA - According to the Statistical Office of the Republic of Slovenia, on January 1, 2010 the surname Černič was used by 194 people in Slovenia and was ranked 2222 among all surnames. When pronouncing, some emphasize the letter e and others i. There is also the surname Črnič. The holders of these surnames, who are not necessarily related, have been dating since 2007.
The mayor's idea
The idea for the meeting came from former Metlika mayor Anton Cernic. “I have read many times in the newspapers about the meetings of classmates or relatives; these are beautiful experiences that bring people closer, "Anton says. Although he has extensive experience in organizing events, as he regularly organizes a meeting of Metlika-born people, he was aware that it would be a large and challenging task, mainly for information purposes. The coincidence brought Jure Černič from Ljubljana to his path. He came to the municipality of Metlika to make billboards; They had not met Anton, but since Jure had left his phone number, the deputy called him because he wanted to meet him. They met the same day and found out they had ancestors in common. Jure was immediately ready to participate in the organization of the Chernichev meeting. They searched the directory and the Internet and searched for the surname Černič.


Last meeting of Č (e) rnic's at the castle in Sevnica

In doing so, they realized that many of the surnames were Blacks. They found that it was actually the same last name, except that one was with e and the other without. "Even my uncle was Črnič, and the other two were Černič, so we agreed to inform the people of both surnames," Anton recalls. On the invitation, they wrote down the first meeting of Černič-Črnič, and then found out that there were many surnames of Černic in Primorska, ie without a roof. But the invitations were already printed and were not corrected. 150 were sent, many were called by telephone. The first meeting in 2007, attended by almost one hundred co-names, mostly from Bela krajina, Kranj and Sevnica, was held in Krasinec near Metlika. It was enriched by the humorist Toni Gašperič and Alenka Mežnaršič, who is most responsible for the protection of the Bela krajina cake, and was also welcomed by the then mayors of Renata Brunskola. The fans decided to make it. The following year, 86 people gathered in Bela Krajina and then organized meetings every two years.
Cernic called from Sombor
At the fourth meeting of Černič and Črnič's in Krasinec near Metlika, most of these surnames appearing in Bela krajina, they adopted the initiative of the organizing committee to have Č (e) rnic their distinctive symbol - the flag and the coat of arms. That year, 420 years had passed since that surname appeared in Slovenia. The black flag is made of two colors, blue and orange, with a shield in the middle and the letter č in it. To make the sign more complete, it has a cherry in it, since it begins with the letter č, grows everywhere in Slovenia just like Č (e) rnice, after all, some call it a cherry and others cherry, which belongs exactly to Černič's, since some have the last name e and others do not. The coat of arms and flag were designed by Anton Černič.Lastly, the sixth meeting between Černič and Črnič was first organized in Melania, Sevnica. They first watched a movie about the castle from Sevnica and then under the expert guidance of the castle, and then they went to 947 meters high Lisca, which is known as the pearl of the Posavje region.


A memorial bottle

A future meeting in Sevnica is also expected, but may be internationally colored. According to the records of the meetings of Č (e) rnic's, Luka Černić from Sombor has come forward and has been researching his roots for several years. “My Černićs left the villages near Kolpa, Pravutino or Krasinec in 1715 and settled as farmers in the Hungarian part of Baranja. Later they came to the Sombor area. The Černić family from Sombor recently celebrated the 270th anniversary of their immigration to these places, because according to known data, Matija and Magdalena Černić came from Baranja in the summer of 1749, "reports Luka Černić, who has been tested in a laboratory in Belgrade and at FTDNA in Houston. So he found out he had relatives in Bela Krajina. A distant namesake wants one of the Slovenian Černič family to take a DNA test to find out who he or she has ancestors from 350 or 400 years ago.


Melanie pancakes also had to be tried at the venue where America's first lady was born.
